title: KSK Mahanadi likely to undergo fresh bidding
description: The move will give a chance for a better valuation for the 1,800-MW project, which saw interest from the likes of Adani Power, Jindal Power and Vedanta Ltd in the first round of auctions, people close to the development said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
